title: net: add support for collective TCP listeners
body:
Latest Linux and DragonFly BSD kernel support this feature. 

The SO_REUSEPORT socket option
https://lwn.net/Articles/542629/

Also see
https://github.com/torvalds/linux/commit/c617f398edd4db2b8567a28e899a88f8f574798d
and
http://gitweb.dragonflybsd.org/dragonfly.git/commitdiff/740d1d9f7b7bf9c9c021abb8197718d7a2d441c9
for the detail.
